title: Splattershot Pro FRZ-N
paragraphs: The Splattershot Pro FRZ-N is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is a Barazushi-branded variant of the the Splattershot Pro from the Splatlands Collection and features a different sub and special weapon.
The Splattershot Pro FRZ-N makes its first appearance in Splatoon 3 with identical stats to the Splattershot Pro.
- Promotional image of the Splatlands Collection - Barazushi weapons

For competitive tips about the Splattershot Pro FRZ-N:
The brand stylization suffix "FRZ-N" could be interpreted as freezing or frozen, regarding the weapon's ice-themed design.
